newsitem.title: DENMARK: Tele Danmark eyes Austrian mobile tender.
newsitem.headline: Tele Danmark eyes Austrian mobile tender.

text.p: Danish telecoms group Tele Danmark on Tuesday said it was a contender for the license to provide Austria's third mobile phone network but declined to give further information.
"We are interested in the current license tender but I cannot comment directly about which consortium negotiations we have in progress," Tele Danmark executive Palle Tolstrup Nielsen told Reuters.

The Austrian news agency APA reported on Monday that Tele Danmark was about to take a 15 to 20 percent stake in Connect Austria, a consortium of Austria's Radex-Heraklith and Girocredit GZWVp.VI, Germany's Viag and unlisted Constantia Privatbank.
Bidders have until July 2 to submit their offers. --Carl Johan Corneliussen, Copenhagen newsroom + 45 33969650
